mapper.select: SELECT REPLY.RNO AS RNO /* 댓글번호 */ , REPLY.BNO AS BNO /* 글번호 */ , REPLY.REPLY AS REPLY /* 댓글내용 */ , REPLY.REPLYER AS USERID /* 유저ID */ , MEMBER.USERNAME AS USERNAME /* 유저명 */ , TO_CHAR(REPLY.REPLYDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REPLYDATE /* 댓글등록일자 */ , TO_CHAR(REPLY.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS UPDATEDATE /* 댓글수정일자 */ FROM TBL_REPLY_B REPLY INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER MEMBER ON REPLY.REPLYER = MEMBER.USERID WHERE REPLY.BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY REPLY.RNO DESC
